span.span: New PreK and Kindergarten Enrollment Please Click Here!
New Students Student Enrollment Grades 1st-12th Please Click Here!

h2.span: Per Executive Order issued by Governor Abbott during the Governors press conference, Whitharral ISD will remain closed for the remainder of the 2019-2020 school year. We will continue to give instruction online and the expectation is that students will complete their work as assigned through May 22, 2020.

We are in this together! The teachers and staff miss your students and would for sure prefer to be back face to face, but that is not the option right now. If you need anything, please email your teacher or Mr. McCollister at nmccollister@whitharralisd.org. We will get through this and come out ready for a better year next year! Keep watching Smores and Facebook for more updates as TEA provides them.
